name: sql-orm-examples
description: Simple repository to illustrate SQL and ORM concepts

scripts.build: rm -rf public && ./compile.sh  && npm run -s og-image && npm run -s deck
scripts.deck: marp --no-stdin --html index.md -o public/index.html && ncp assets public/assets
scripts.start: npm run -s build && npx parcel public/index.html
